SEARCH
Package jdbcInterfaces

Interface SignalManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
JDBCSignal
public interface SignalManager
Manages persistence and retrieval operations for the Signal entity in the database, including complex lookups by client and medical record.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addSignal(Signal signal)
    Inserts a new signal record into the database.
    int
    getClientIdBySignalId(int signalId)
    Retrieves the client ID associated with a specific signal ID.
    Signal
    getSignalById(int signalId)
    Retrieves a specific signal record from the database using its unique ID.
    List<Signal>
    getSignalsByClientId(int clientId)
    Retrieves a list of all signal records associated with a specific client ID.
    List<Signal>
    getSignalsByRecordId(int recordId)
    Retrieves all signal records associated with a specific medical history record ID.
    TypeSignal
    getSignalTypeByRecordId(int recordId)
    Retrieves the type (ECG or EMG) of the signal associated with a given medical history record ID.

  • Method Details

    • addSignal

      void addSignal(Signal signal) throws Exception
      Inserts a new signal record into the database.
      Parameters:
      signal - The Signal object to add.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the database insertion.

    • getSignalById

      Signal getSignalById(int signalId)
      Retrieves a specific signal record from the database using its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      signalId - The unique ID of the signal to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The populated Signal object, or null if the signal is not found.

    • getSignalsByRecordId

      List<Signal> getSignalsByRecordId(int recordId)
      Retrieves all signal records associated with a specific medical history record ID.
      Parameters:
      recordId - The ID of the medical history record whose signals are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Signal objects associated with the record. Returns an empty list if none are found.

    • getSignalsByClientId

      List<Signal> getSignalsByClientId(int clientId)
      Retrieves a list of all signal records associated with a specific client ID.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client whose signals are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Signal objects associated with the client.

    • getSignalTypeByRecordId

      TypeSignal getSignalTypeByRecordId(int recordId)
      Retrieves the type (ECG or EMG) of the signal associated with a given medical history record ID.
      Parameters:
      recordId - The ID of the medical history record.
      Returns:
      The TypeSignal enum value (ECG or EMG), or null if no signal type is found for the record.

    • getClientIdBySignalId

      int getClientIdBySignalId(int signalId)
      Retrieves the client ID associated with a specific signal ID.
      Parameters:
      signalId - The ID of the signal whose owner is to be determined.
      Returns:
      The ID of the client who owns the signal, or -1 if the association is not found.
